channel.title: 🔥 Open Data hot twitter posts | by onData
channel.description: Tweets about open data, which have received at least 10 hearts or retweets, in many languages

item.title: #en @ 1510369298673508355
item.description: Where does the ☀️ emoji for @FlareNetworks originate from??? Looks like #Layercake white paper, the triangles on outside are “ATTESTERS” used by State Connector system to prove state of state of other blockchain networks or any open data source. Anyone may operate as an attester https://t.co/geE7mjnJUh

item.title: #es @ 1510301120979165192
item.description:
¿Qué es #DataWeekNL?
Un espacio para construir nuevas formas de ver y entender los #DatosAbiertos en #NuevoLeón 🔓
‼️Súmate con nosotros‼️ @CodeandoMexico @INAImexico @IRI_es @udem @COTAINL
🗓 7 de abril ⏰ 10:00 horas 🎥 Transmisión en vivo por: https://t.co/vayYnKHOzk https://t.co/i4mRrGAAIB

item.title: #en @ 1510297529056997376
item.description: Strong fires may be caused by the use of one of the Russian missile sets #Balakliia #Andriivka 50km from #Kharkiv 2022.04.01 Photos thx @sentinel_hub #sentinel2 SWIR False color (urban) + visualization wildfire script by @Pierre_Markuse #OpenData #UkraineRussiaWar #UkraineWar 🛰️ https://t.co/0ne47WlWGq

item.title: #en @ 1510280764235071500
item.description:
How can you advance your anti-corruption reforms through open data? 📊
Learn about this awesome tool created by @opendatacharter, @GlobalIntegrity, @ildalatam, @ldriafrica, and OD4D, a project supported by the OGP Multi-Donor Trust Fund. https://t.co/zLtjQnC76v

item.title: #es @ 1510258117619167235
#en @ 1510242440103571459
item.description: This year’s #openuk Open Technology for #Sustainability event - #cop26 plus one - will take place in Wales, 12-14 October. Final details bring sorted this weekend and more will be shared shortly #opensource #opendata #openhardware @SeneddWales https://t.co/tP90xdU5zx

item.title: #en @ 1510225359924572160
item.description: In an internet where walled gardens throw long shadows @carlmalamud sheds some light on dark corners by increasing transparency through legal wrestling over what should be open data. True hero of the internet. https://t.co/XNc3xDVnN9

item.title: #en @ 1510220132727111685
item.description: The fact that UK postal addresses are not open data is a longstanding problem that lots of people have tried to fix. We (a small 'coalition of the willing') are having another go at it. One more heave! https://t.co/zUiz8PkWY7

item.title: #en @ 1510216890408488967
#fr @ 1510169073002373122
item.description: À la conférence d'@infoclimat aux #JDLL, j'apprends que @meteofrance ne distribue toujours pas ses données en #OpenData. Bonjour, le service public :-(

item.title: #ar @ 1510167631596343303
item.description:
قائمة الأحياء الأكثر نشاطا في عدد الصفقات حسب نوع العقار (قم بتحديد المنطقة )
https://t.co/9hYhlTeHXE

item.title: #de @ 1510150286777614340
item.description: Heute ist internationaler #FactCheckingDay. Zum Fakten-Check bieten wir viele Daten, egal ob in unserer Datenbank, generell auf unserer Website oder den Social-Media-Kanälen. Aktuell zum Beispiel zu den Auswirkungen des Krieges in der Ukraine: https://t.co/Qy8zY6Flp5 #OpenData https://t.co/mIafYLQu9g

item.title: #it @ 1510148600352972800
item.description: @GiorgiaLodi è incredibile come in altri paesi sia normale pubblicare registro imprese, catasto, reati, incidenti stradali, CAP, qualità dell'aria, con estrema granularità e in Italia invece tutto ciò possa essere considerato impossibile. La nostra politica non ha capito NULLA degli #OpenData

item.title: #ja @ 1510145157718753283
item.description: 霧島山（えびの高原（硫黄山）周辺） 火山性地震 3月30日 12回 https://t.co/XKjQlkxmtv

item.title: #es @ 1510107261292756994
item.description: De acuerdo con información recopilada por Etcétera a través de datos abiertos, los impuestos de los mexicanos pagarán cerca de 500 millones de pesos por los 5 años y 10 meses que AMLO habitará en Palacio Nacional. https://t.co/EiX87B575L

item.title: #pt @ 1510022035455754240
item.description:
A @Prefeitura_Rio realizou acordo de cooperação técnica com a @okfnbr para desenhar uma política de dados abertos e aperfeiçoar sua governança de dados tendo a transparência como princípio.
Na entrevista dada pela @fecampa ao @valoreconomico comenta parceria. (1/2)

item.title: #en @ 1510018859411152907
item.description: 📢 ANNOUNCEMENT: The COVID-19 Canada Open Data Working Group dataset is changing on April 15. See below for details. 👇 https://t.co/wJIj6JLire

item.title: #fr @ 1509977087033106446
item.description: Non, L'Escale n'a pas d'autorisation pour installer une terrasse à cet endroit (d'après l'open data). D'ailleurs il a fait une première demande en juin 2021, probablement refusée, puis une nouvelle demande il y a tout juste 2 semaines... Cc @CollectifNS @ArielWeilT @MParisCentre https://t.co/HhUDN8Lrpi

item.title: #es @ 1509971478464368644
item.description:
En el limbo, 70% de los procesos por posibles delitos en el país.
Esto es lo que revelan los datos abiertos de la Fiscalía (@FiscaliaCol) sobre noticias criminales, que fueron analizados por la Unidad de Datos de EL TIEMPO ► https://t.co/Hv4EGJhRcJ https://t.co/EjtxD1S5Ut

item.title: #es @ 1509961686840709128
item.description: #COVID19mx Con base en los datos abiertos de la @SSalud_mx se deduce que los niños de 5 a 8 años de edad tienen tanto o más riesgo que adolescentes de 12 a 16, lo justo sería vacunar de 5 años en adelante, como ya sucede en varios países. Entre más vacunados, menos muertos. https://t.co/j1HlC8Qjvr

item.title: #pt @ 1509936089582260227
item.description: Mesmo assim, segundo ela, há avanços importantes acontecendo. A prefeitura do Rio, por exemplo, pediu auxílio à Open Knowledge Brasil para desenhar uma política de dados abertos. “Estamos firmando um acordo de cooperação não oneroso com a prefeitura para fazer isso”

item.title: #pt @ 1509936085694042112
item.description: Segundo a especialista, as cidades só vão avançar quando houver planejamento, continuidade de políticas de transparência mesmo com trocas de governos, investimento em governança de dados abertos e capacitação de pessoal para qualificar essas bases de dados.

item.title: #pt @ 1509936081667600385
item.description: Pela 1ª vez, em 2022, a OKBR fará um ranking com todas as capitais do país, analisando a forma como disponibilizam dados abertos.“Precisamos de transparência sobre como estão as políticas de educação, saúde, seus resultados, como os recursos estão sendo disponibilizados”

item.title: #it @ 1509924785987342338
item.description: 1️⃣ Con la fine dell'emergenza COVID, il @DPCgov non gestirà più i dati aperti sulla pandemia. Siamo confidenti che verrà fatto un adeguato passaggio di consegne, probabilmente al @MinisteroSalute

item.title: #en @ 1509922036281495553
item.description: Together with @HN_Schlottman we did a war map on ukraine: Where are the russian troops? We will update it regularly with new and past positions. Data free for use #OpenData https://t.co/R9ahUsrLef https://t.co/RxlL3bfUVq

item.title: #it @ 1509919106451099651
item.description: 📢 Con la campagna #DatiBeneComune chiediamo al Governo la pubblicazione di dati aperti precisi, puntuali, tempestivi, riutilizzabili sui progetti del #PNRR 🧰 E con la piattaforma-dossier #iDatiCheVorrei scopriamo chi, cosa, dove, quando e perché, su https://t.co/9GAaIpRhlk ▶️ https://t.co/fUa2upwYRH

item.title: #es @ 1509911153543041025
item.description: @taliawegman La secuenciación completa, más los datos abiertos esta increíble. Más investigadores podrán buscar las respuestas a las miles de preguntas que tenemos. Ya ven, no?? 😃

item.title: #en @ 1509904555336781829

We are resuming OMEGA's distribution today!
OMEGA is the Open MEG Archive, one of the largest #OpenData repository of neurophysiological data, now entirely in @BIDSstandard.
@mcgillu @McGillMed @TheNeuro_MNI 1/3 https://t.co/ybZB3RFxPM

item.title: #en @ 1509898613140434975
item.description:
@AmerAcadPeds @AAPPres @nytimes @CDCgov I know data analysis takes time, but I’m concerned that this data was collected a year ago but only shared now after @CDCgov and @POTUS had started advocating to keep schools open.
Data should inform policy, but it feels like policy instead informs what data we get to see.

item.title: #en @ 1509897736216264709
item.description: Our UK GaiaX Hub workshop looked at #openuk leading a Data Hub for the UK incorporating #gaiax @gaiax_aisbl #opendata #opensource See https://t.co/7DJnE0C3Ss https://t.co/o0n7Mmq7P1

item.title: #en @ 1509893748636925954
item.description:
An aside: This story is a triumph of open data.
For years, the city has put out a database of collisions causing death or serious injury — a resource of around 17,000 records, but really not enough of a sample for such a citywide analysis.
This is 500,000.
*That* is a sample.

item.title: #en @ 1509884391228588034
item.description:
Check out our April issue, online now!
Papers in this issue link to #opendata from @datadryad @EDIgotdata @nceas @figshare @USGS @ABbiodiversity @DataINRAE @zenodo_org @LivingAtlas @TERN_Aus @CSIRO
Thanks to @Tina__Schroeder et al. for this cover pic!
https://t.co/SyiVrQ9e7H https://t.co/FKvABSI63H

item.title: #en @ 1509881455060652033
item.description: We have compiled and published an #opendata set of our optical properties measurements of Norway #spruce needles from 2009 to 2017. Available via #Mendelydata here: https://t.co/9d9uQMUhUp #hyperspectral https://t.co/4RfGIuHtT1

item.title: #en @ 1509869942350704641
item.description: The Swiss company register "ZEFIX" is now Open Data! 🎉🍾 Super happy this finally happened, @zazukocom maintains the Linked Data pipeline for RDF publication. Based on that, our colleague Magdalena did this great Jupyter Notebook with some stats: https://t.co/Pj0NcrR1N9 Enjoy! https://t.co/4F9CRHChRE

item.title: #fr @ 1509863128640761856
item.description:
Après les parrainages et les déclarations de patrimoines, l" #OpenData continue à éclairer les #electionpresidentielle2022 .
Retrouvez les temps de parole et d'antenne des candidats à la présidentielle mesurés par l'@Arcom_fr ➡️ https://t.co/hNeVOsVJyU https://t.co/57PGhlC0S6

item.title: #en @ 1509858163750850573
item.description: We make some recommendations: Psych Science should require a reproducibility check at the peer review stage before awarding badges, and the badge could be renamed “Open Data and Code” to avoid confusion and encourage researchers to adhere to this higher standard. |13

item.title: #en @ 1509858139071565852
item.description: It’s really important to note that our goal was *not* to critique the individual papers or authors, but rather to examine the overall effectiveness of the Open Data badge policy at Psychological Science in achieving its aims. |5

item.title: #en @ 1509858135007191043
item.description: So we did just that! Here is a preprint of our study in which we look at whether the Open Data badge policy lives up to its ideal of ensuring reproducibility: https://t.co/QaiO6wy2mG |3

item.title: #en @ 1509858132369027074
item.description: Of course, @sTeamTraen saw this as an opportunity to check if the Open Data badge policy delivers on its promises: https://t.co/Q7sLtZpd4W |2

item.title: #en @ 1509858129848291330
item.description: In the April 2019 issue of Psychological Science, every research article received an Open Data badge. This was and is exciting! |1 https://t.co/AdjJSIj40Y

item.title: #de @ 1509857436445954051
item.description: Ab heute im neuen #Thünen-Atlas zu entdecken: vier #Atlanten unter einem Dach. Mit digitalen Karten und jeder Menge Daten zu Ackerbau und Tierhaltung, Meeresnutzung, Wäldern und Erreichbarkeitsanalysen für ländliche Räume. ➡️https://t.co/5wZsP2NXfF #OpenData #Geodaten @GeoNode https://t.co/fjWV0ByHM0

item.title: #en @ 1509844594585919489
item.description: What do we actually mean by 'Linked Open Data'? It's a bit more than putting up some info on the web. To give you the basics here is the team from the Linking Islands of Data Project to tell you more. A bit more fun than just reading about it! https://t.co/3s3ioQaquJ

item.title: #es @ 1509841764970029083
item.description:
#CasosdeUso | 🔥 Con la llegada de la primavera, el riesgo de incendios aumenta. ¿Sabías que Portugal cuenta con un portal de #DatosAbiertos que recoge diferentes registros ambientales para anticipar el riesgo de incendios forestales?
Descúbrelo aquí: https://t.co/x9iB5nVIbY https://t.co/FY7iQYw7iR

item.title: #fi @ 1509841589937528832
item.description: #digihumaus esitetään hyviä skenaarioita digi-yhteiskuntamme kehityksestä. #avoindata tarkasteluun kaipaisi uudenlaista sanoitusta: lähtödata tuskin on avointa sellaisenaan - tietoa voidaan yhteiskäyttää monin eri tavoin: avoin data vs. yhteiskäyttötieto @janneviskari @DVVfi

item.title: #en @ 1509829249263452180
item.description:

🔥 We need data + powerful knowledge management. YES?

item.title: #de @ 1509816273647112194
item.description: Die parlamentarische Begutachtung zum Informationsweiterverwendungsgesetz (#IWG2022) wurde eingeleitet und läuft bis 29.4.2022! Ziel: Umsetzung der #OpenData und #PSI Richtlinie der EU. Gesetzentwurf und Begleitunterlagen sind ab sofort abrufbar unter: https://t.co/JqGrSMku6l https://t.co/odZNdGp6xs

item.title: #de @ 1509805630294573063
item.description: Liebe GND, wir finden es toll, dass du mit deiner CC0-Lizenz so früh ein Vorbild für Open Data warst. Wir wünschen uns diese Offenheit auch bei der Datentransformation, so dass wir endlich direkt zur Verbesserung des GND-LOD beitragen können. #10JahreGND

item.description: The composition of Putin’s medical team suggests he might have thyroid cancer, according to Proyekt’s new investigation. The team includes otolaryngologists and a cancer surgeon. The investigation is based on open data from the government procurement site. https://t.co/7s8EvQbfmQ

item.title: #en @ 1509639180158058540
item.description: In addition to this new 5B sample dataset release, @CadeGordonML and I finished the first at scale CLIP training for LAION-400m -- essentially matching OpenAI's results for ViT-B/32. Exciting to see what's next with bigger models and now bigger, open data. https://t.co/X9TN3PIgdk

item.title: #en @ 1509617158795722753
item.description: @jbloom_lab You continue to be a leading example of transparency and civility in the virology community. This is more important than ever as the interntnl public has lost so much faith in Science communications lately. Open data is what science should be about, and it's much appreciated.

item.title: #en @ 1509593391096635395
item.description: DPGs are open-source software, open data, open AI models, open standards, and open content that adhere to privacy and other applicable best practices, following do no harm by design. These unlock the potential of digital transformation while protecting against many of the risks.

item.title: #it @ 1509560290047934473
item.description: La maggior parte dei dataset del settore pubblico sono pensati per essere visti a monitor non per essere rielaborati. Vale anche per dataset veramente #opendata (formato aperto + licenza aperta). Pertanto questi due requisiti minimi non sono più sufficienti. Ci vuole #dataquality
